Package com.naildrivin5.fwf.core

Main classes for the Fun Web Framework

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ActionTrigger This triggers the actions based on the request.
ControllerFinder Handles locating the controller based on a list of packages and a model name.
ControllerFinderFactory Provides access to ControllerFinder instances.
ControllerPreparer Prepares a controller for performing an action.
FWFServlet The main servlet that implements the Fun Web Framework.
ParameterParser Parses parameters from ServletRequest into a more useful class.
ParameterParserFactory Provides access to ParameterParser instances.
ParsedRoute Represents a parsed route in terms of a model, id, and action.
RouteParser Parses parameters from ServletRequest into a more useful class.
RouteParserFactory Provides access to RouteParser instances.
StringUtils Utility methods for dealing with strings.
ViewFinder Handles locating the view based on the controller and action name.
 

Enum Summary
RequestMethod HTTP Request methods.
 

Package com.naildrivin5.fwf.core Description

Main classes for the Fun Web Framework
